programme.title: F1: Chinese Grand Prix
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Shanghai International Circuit for the 2025 Chinese Grand Prix. The then three-time world champion Max Verstappen claimed race victory here a year ago.

programme.title: The F1 Wheelchair
programme.desc: Set to compete at the Paris Games having won four gold medals in Tokyo, Swiss Paralympian Marcel Hug worked with the Sauber Formula 1 team to design his racing wheelchair.
